metadata.title: CVE-2020-11441 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** phpMyAdmin 5.0.2 allows CRLF injection, as demonstrated by %0D%0Astring%0D%0A inputs to login form fields causing CRLF sequences to be reflected on an error page. NOTE: the vendor states "I don't see anything specifically exploitable."

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
